name: My Giant War
description:
Left Mose Button - High Hit,  

Right mouse Button - Low Hit (for worms),

Shift - Stick it (For acnes and scars)

This is a war of a women. Against some she knows....

Credits:

Game Design, Programming, SFX, Music: Ural Kemal Kavraal (ural89)

SFX, Voice Over, 2D art, Background, Cover: Nazlıcan Nisa Okay (narkisos)
